metadata.name: 안녕ㅣAnnyong
metadata.description:
안녕(Annyong) Pass serves as a basic entry ticket that grants you access to the 3-day gathering and various other side events.

안녕(Annyong) is a friendly greeting in Korean - both for hello and bye - that represents the spirit of SeoulBound, from start to finish.
metadata.criteria:
Step 1: Apply for an invitation and make sure to provide your wallet address during the application process (http://seoulbound.fun/apply).

Step 2: Check your email for an invitation letter, which will confirm your participation and provide further details about the gathering.

Step 3: Connect your wallet to the ticket page and mint your SBT.
metadata.evidence: The winner of this badge is an honored participant of SeoulBound 2023 and an ecosystem contributor in the DAO space, specially invited by the SeoulBound Team.
